Wood.name: Wood
Wood.desc: A plank of wood that can be used to create all sorts of things.

Ruby.name: Ruby
Ruby.desc: A small gem that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

Emerald.name: Emerald
Emerald.desc: A small gem that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

Diamond.name: Diamond
Diamond.desc: A small gem that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

Shroom.name: Shroom
Shroom.desc: A spongy, bouncy mushroom that can be used to create or enhance all sorts of things.

JellyCore.name: Jelly Core
JellyCore.desc: Rare cores from the Monia species that can be used to create or enhance a few things.

Crystal.name: Crystal
Crystal.desc: Rare crystals from the Shimite species that can be used to create or enhance a few things.

SliceOfPizza.name: Slice of Pizza
SliceOfPizza.desc: Yummy! Pizza! This item restores one ally's HP by 50.

ChickenNugget.name: Chicken Nugget
ChickenNugget.desc: Just a chicken nugget. Restores one ally's HP by 20.

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.desc: A nice juicy apple to restore one's HP by 40.

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.desc: If one were to drink this, their HP would be restored by 80.

MPPotion.name: MP Potion
MPPotion.desc: If one were to drink this, their MP would be restored by 60.

GreaterPotion.name: Greater Potion
GreaterPotion.desc: If one were to drink this, their HP would be restored by 175.

BottleOfWater.name: Bottle of Water
BottleOfWater.desc: Just water. Restores HP & MP by 50.

SparkleBerry.name: Sparkle Berry
SparkleBerry.desc: A berry that is said to taste really good. Restores HP by 65.

ShineBerry.name: Shine Berry
ShineBerry.desc: A berry that is said to taste really good. Restores MP by 50.

PlumpBerry.name: Plump Berry
PlumpBerry.desc: A berry that is said to taste really good. Restores HP & MP by 50.

BerryBlend.name: Berry Blend
BerryBlend.desc: A tasty, soft sponge cake tasting of 3 different berries. Restores 150 HP & 150 MP.

GlowShroom.name: Glow Shroom
GlowShroom.desc: Large mushroom that heals 80HP upon consumption

RevivalSpray.name: Revival Spray
RevivalSpray.desc: Spray this on someone's wounds to wake them up from unconciousness.

SuperPotion.name: Super Potion
SuperPotion.desc: If one were to drink this, their HP would be restored by 160.

MolotovCocktail.name: Molotov Cocktail
MolotovCocktail.desc: A throwable cocktail full of fire that explodes upon contact after a throw.

CookedTurkey.name: Cooked Turkey
CookedTurkey.desc: A whole Thanksgiving cooked turkey for the party to enjoy together. Pass the mashed potatoes! üòã

PoisonLeaf.name: Poison Leaf
PoisonLeaf.desc: Cover yourself with a Poison Leaf.

KillerPotion.name: Killer Potion
KillerPotion.desc: Toss a killer potion to instantly down the foe.

SpiritCrystal.name: Spirit Crystal
SpiritCrystal.desc: It is a slightly transparent, black crystal with a glowing spirit inside of it, said to give power when used, however with a permament side effect of gaining a spirit inside of the activator, no matter the amount they already have.

Lychen.name: Lychen
Lychen.desc: A scrumptious berry that glows for as long as the time will allow. Used for giving out blessings and fortune to ones that consume it.

E-Tank.name: E-Tank
E-Tank.desc: A full refill! Use it to completely heal an ally back to full health. Don't use it too late though... || PS: I am not sorry for defining this. -Rainbow

MoltMaterial.name: MoltMaterial
MoltMaterial.desc: Material from Grifflares, used for crafting armor and weapons.

ClearTear.name: ClearTear
ClearTear.desc: Water of a Flow Sprout, encased in a tear-like shape. Useful for crafting armor.

PotionOfLiquidFlame.name: Potion Of Liquid Flame
PotionOfLiquidFlame.desc: This potion contains an unstable compound which will burst violently into flame upon exposure to open air. Likely to burn the hit foe.

PotionOfFrost.name: Potion Of Frost
PotionOfFrost.desc: The chemical contained in this potion will evaporate into a freezing cloud upon exposure to open air. Likely to freeze the hit foe.

PotionOfToxicGas.name: Potion Of Toxic Gas
PotionOfToxicGas.desc: Uncorking or shattering this pressurized glass will cause its contents to explode into a deadly cloud of toxic green gas. Might poison some foes.

PotionOfHaste.name: Potion Of Haste
PotionOfHaste.desc: Drinking this oddly sweet liquid will imbue you with tremendous energy for a short time, allowing you to run at high speeds.

PotionOfStrength.name: Potion Of Strength
PotionOfStrength.desc: This powerful liquid will course through your muscles, increasing your attack.

RageEssence.name: RageEssence
RageEssence.desc:
[RARE]
Pure essence of rage in edible form.

DreamEssence.name: DreamEssence
DreamEssence.desc:
[RARE]
Pure essence of a dream in powder, used to put people to sleep.

AchievementEssence.name: AchievementEssence
AchievementEssence.desc:
[RARE]
Pure essence of a achievement in drinkable form.

DriveEssence.name: DriveEssence
DriveEssence.desc:
[RARE]
Pure essence of sexual drive in a sweet edible shell made for enemies to eat, and potentially have them fall in love with you.

RichHunger.name: RichHunger
RichHunger.desc:
[RARE]
It's like a living oxymoron. Hunger, yet somehow rich. Eat it and recover some health and mana, at the cost of possibly being hungry for more

OutburnedSpike.name: OutburnedSpike
OutburnedSpike.desc:
[RARE]
A large spike of burns, how weird. Could be used to craft something.

EverstaringEye.name: Everstaring Eye
EverstaringEye.desc:
[RARE]
Just an everstaring eye of fear. Make it stare at someone and it might give someone the geebies.

CalmingPotion.name: Calming Potion
CalmingPotion.desc:
[RARE]
Can be used when a deity is 50% pacified or more to instantly pacify.
